title: Fluids and Electrolytes v5.0.0
description:
A resource with a conversational writing style makes complex fundamentals of fluids and electrolytes easy to understand and put into practice. 

This latest update is based on the 5th edition with additional features, enhanced functionality and ongoing updates.

Fluids and Electrolytes Made Incredibly Easy includes topics with clear, simple explanations of health problems, definitions of key terms, clear illustrations of key concepts, memory joggers, and checklists for important points.

- Current infusion nursing standards of practice
- Fully updated content
- Written in easy-to-understand language that brings complex concepts to light
- Quick-scan tables, illustrations, and flow charts focus on key information
- Ã¢â‚¬Å“Ages and stages" icons identify age-related considerations
- "Chart smart" sections outline all the points that require documentation for a specific imbalance or condition
- "It's not working" icons tell the reader what to do when standard interventions aren't getting results
- "Teaching points" focus on topics to teach patients
- "Uh-oh" icons help the reader quickly recognize dangerous or life-threatening signs and symptoms
- Quick reference appendices on fluid and electrolyte differences in pediatric and geriatric populations
- "Memory joggers" mnemonics help the reader understand and remember difficult concepts
- "That's a wrap!" sections provide end-of-topic summaries
- End-of-topic "Quick Quizzes" test readers' knowledge
- Revised Blood product chart
